nodes.body:
Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/90389ff5-bf0f-4cb3-94a5-6ae5182bd84b) for commit b7749d2fc7b9bad3880a1519b8785c03c456ef78.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/d8236b0a-76f5-4b5d-871e-84109012ecf5/to/90389ff5-bf0f-4cb3-94a5-6ae5182bd84b) against commit 1308f9597e6fc966db1271e227149fa7db7cbdc1:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                         Metric         Change
  =======================================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Lie.CartanExists                                 instructions   -42.8%
- ~Mathlib.Algebra.Lie.Weights.Cartan                               instructions    12.6%
- ~Mathlib.Algebra.Lie.Weights.Killing                              instructions     5.5%
- ~Mathlib.Algebra.Lie.Weights.RootSystem                           instructions     9.9%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.ProjectiveSpectrum.Scheme              instructions    -3.9%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.NormedSpace.PiTensorProduct.InjectiveSeminorm   instructions    -5.0%
- ~Mathlib.FieldTheory.Extension                                    instructions    26.5%
+ ~Mathlib.FieldTheory.IntermediateField                            instructions   -33.4%
+ ~Mathlib.FieldTheory.PurelyInseparable                            instructions    -9.8%
+ ~Mathlib.FieldTheory.SeparableClosure                             instructions   -15.9%
+ ~Mathlib.FieldTheory.SeparableDegree                              instructions   -53.8%
```

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/90389ff5-bf0f-4cb3-94a5-6ae5182bd84b) for commit b7749d2fc7b9bad3880a1519b8785c03c456ef78.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/d8236b0a-76f5-4b5d-871e-84109012ecf5/to/90389ff5-bf0f-4cb3-94a5-6ae5182bd84b) against commit 1308f9597e6fc966db1271e227149fa7db7cbdc1:

- ~Mathlib.Algebra.Lie.Weights.Cartan                               instructions    12.6%
- ~Mathlib.Algebra.Lie.Weights.Killing                              instructions     5.5%
- ~Mathlib.Algebra.Lie.Weights.RootSystem                           instructions     9.9%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.ProjectiveSpectrum.Scheme              instructions    -3.9%

- ~Mathlib.FieldTheory.Extension                                    instructions    26.5%

+ ~Mathlib.FieldTheory.PurelyInseparable                            instructions    -9.8%
